answers.answer: I dont know your full history anything, but have you ever been tested for diabetes?
yes, and I don't have diabetes.thanks

question: Hi, I hope someone can help me.  I have had some blader problems over the years.  I'm 30 years old and male.  At night I get up at time 3-6 times and I also go a lot during the day.  Also I have trouble going and emtying my bladder.  I have also had a few prostate infectings.  I will be going to my third urolgist at the end of the month.  The first two put me through a lot of test and tried differnt medication.  Sometimes the medication works for a while but then it stops.thanks
title: They Cant find out what is wrong
